Package com.ccprog3.myfarm.terminalinterface

Class Question

java.lang.Object
com.ccprog3.myfarm.terminalinterface.Question
Direct Known Subclasses:
GridInput, IntegerInput, LineInput, MultiChoice
public abstract class Question extends Object
The parent class that inherits other types of questions.
Author:
John Joseph F. Giron
